scene_target: Artie locks in his 'Crit or Quit' build with 1 HP and 100% Critical Hit rate.
goal: Establish Artie's glitchy build and his dynamic with the tutorial guide, Fizz.
conflict: Artie's reckless stat allocation versus Fizz's standard tutorial protocols and safety warnings.
end_condition: Artie's build is finalized and the System Void begins to transition into the Slime Fields tutorial zone.

last_scene: Artie met his tutorial guide, Fizz, in the Character Creation Void.
Against Fizz's advice, Artie dumped all his points into Critical Hit Rate, exploiting a bonus pool from his glitchy death.
The System finalized his build at 1 HP and 100% Crit Rate, then forcibly transitioned them to the Slime Fields.
key_events: Artie identifies the 'Bonus Anomaly Pool' of 50 points.
Artie allocates all 10 standard points and 50 bonus points into Critical Hit Rate.
The System triggers the 'Glass Soul' condition, locking Artie's HP at 1/1.
Artie's Crit Rate is set to 100% and he unlocks the 'Crit or Quit' title.
The System Void dissolves and transitions into the Slime Fields tutorial zone.
must_stay_true: Artie's HP is 1/1 (locked) and Crit Rate is 100%.
